law.catch_line: False declaration of acreage and concealment of nursery stock prohibited.
law.text: No person shall make a false declaration of acreage or conceal any nursery stock from inspection.
law.history: Created 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 142, sec. 14, effective July 15, 1996.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/15/96). In creating the tables for the 1996 Kentucky Acts, this statute was assigned the number KRS 249.095. The statute was renumbered as KRS 249.104 during codification.
